name: Tetsudou-ou 2: Sekai Seifuku no Yabou!!
overview: Tetsudo oh 2 - Sekai Seifuku no Yabou is the sequel to Tetsudo oh '96 - Ikuze Okuban Chouja (a board game in which the goal is the be the Railway king. To get this the player will have to face 1 or 3 rivals that will try to get that goal earlier than him). The gameplay is the usual japanese board game with some mini games. 10 different characters to choose and 4 different boards to play (World, United States, Australia & Japan). The story mode starts with the intro movie showing how an alien arrives to Earth and try to conquer it, the game 10 characters from all the parts of the World will try to defeat him before he destroy all the cities in the board game. With every roll of the dice the player advance through the map of the board but that make his money decrease, he can increase it when he arrives at towns and other special parts or when other character arrives at one of his squares.
